mapper.sql: idproduct, productname, productnamejapan, idbrand, idcategory, officalprice, recentlybookprice, iddiscountsetting, istax, taxfee, discount, weight, costPrice, costPriceJpy, saleprice, createtime, createuser, updatetime, updateuser, isactive
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from product
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT p.idproduct, p.productname, p.productnamejapan, p.idbrand, p.idcategory, p.officalprice, p.recentlybookprice, p.istax, p.taxfee, p.weight, p.costprice, p.costpricejpy, p.saleprice, p.createtime, p.createuser, p.updatetime, p.updateuser, p.isactive, d.iddiscountsetting, d.discountsettingname, d.discountsettingcomment, d.discount, b.brandname, c.categoryname FROM product p, brand b, category c, discountsetting d WHERE idproduct = #{idproduct,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND p.idbrand = b.idbrand AND p.idcategory = c.idcategory AND p.iddiscountsetting = d.iddiscountsetting
mapper.insert: insert into product (idproduct, productname, productnamejapan, idbrand, idcategory, officalprice, recentlybookprice, iddiscountsetting, istax, taxfee, discount, weight, costPrice, costPriceJpy, saleprice, createtime, createuser, updatetime, updateuser, isactive) values (#{idproduct,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productnamejapan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idbrand,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idcategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{officalprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{recentlybookprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{iddiscountsetting,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{istax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxfee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{costprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{costpricejpy,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{saleprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isactive,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS idproduct
